help-file.title: FIRESHIELD
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn fireshield (for innate) Area of effect: <self> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Up to 3 hours, dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Fire
"Fireshield" provides protection from magical fire attacks and some protection against physical attacks, reflecting the damage back at the attacker. It is similar to the spell "Coldshield."
